text: George Albert Sinner (May 19, 1928 - March 9, 2018) was an American politician. He served as the 29th Governor of North Dakota from 1985 through 1992. He served two four-year terms as governor. Sinner died on March 9, 2018 in Fargo of pneumonia at the age of 89.Former North Dakota Gov. title: George A. Sinner
